[bHannah James and Sam Sweeney first played together in the group Kerfuffle in 2002 but you might also know them from their separate work with Bellowhead and the Demon Barber Roadshow. Catches and Glees is their debut album as a duo but has a confidence and assuredness that belie their young years. The vocal tracks are new arrangements of traditional material and cover the typical subject matter of folk songs. This is a album of traditional material performed by two of the brightest young stars of the folk scene and throughly enjoyable to boot.
